snippet: The state Court of Appeals on Tuesday upheld a lower court’s ruling affirming the constitutionality of a program that directs public money to pay for private school tuition for some students.
abstract: Arizona Court of Appeals upholds lower court ruling affirming constitutionality of program that directs public money back to private bank accounts to pay for private school tuition and educational services for some students.
lead_paragraph: The state Court of Appeals on Tuesday upheld a lower court’s ruling affirming the constitutionality of a program that directs public money to pay for private school tuition for some students.

headline.main: Arizona: Court Upholds School Funding Program
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Court Upholds School Funding Program
